description: Ricotta and Amaretti (that's the cookies, not the liquer) Cake.

directions.step: Preheat the oven to 350 Degrees Fahrenheit.
Mix the Ricotta, 2/3rd of the sugar, the Amaretti, the rum and 1/2 of the eggs well to make the filling.
Put the flour, with the yeast mixed in, in a bowl and make a well in it. Put the butter cut into chunks, the rest of the sugar, and the other two eggs in the well and mix.
Join all the ingredients in the dough together well and knead it until it holds together but isn't sticky. Divide the dough into two parts.
Coat the inside of a cake pan with butter and flour and use one part of the dough to cover the inside of the pan (both the bottom and the sides)
Put the filling inside the pan, smooth out the filling and cover the pan with the other half of the dough.
Bake the cake for about 45 minutes and then take it out, place it upside down on a serving dish and evenly sprinkle the top with powdered sugar.
Torta di Ricotta e Amaretti done.
